data.title: Monitoring — BroadAspect
data.text:
Monitoring as a Service

BroadAspect selected Paessler’s PRTG monitoring platform for its own internal infrastructure monitoring and now offers PRTG as a service to customers. PRTG is an enterprise class solution to monitor the uptime and performance of infrastructure and applications. The monitoring solution goes far beyond ping and http get. It is also extremely flexible allowing customers to tailor fit thresholds, sampling rates and notifications that meet your business requirements.

If it has an IP address, we can monitor it!

BroadAspect is a Paessler partner and has deployed a robust PRTG cluster across multiple data centers for high availability, performance and ability to monitor from multiple locations. Customers utilize our hosted PRTG environment on a ‘per sensor’ basis. This allows for very simple pricing and packaging that is easy to understand.

More about Paessler PRTG-

Paessler AG’s award winning PRTG Network Monitor is a powerful, affordable and easy-to-use Unified Monitoring solution. It is a highly flexible and generic software for monitoring IT infrastructure, already in use at enterprises and organizations of all sizes and industries. Over 150,000 IT administrators in more than 170 countries rely on PRTG and gain peace of mind, confidence and convenience. Founded in 1997 and based in Nuremberg, Germany, Paessler AG remains a privately held company that is recognized as both a member of the Cisco Solution Partner Program and a VMware Technology Alliance Partner.
